title: Screen resolution
body: My laptop is a 12 inch, but it is not in full screen can someone tell the Width and height for the resolution.

replies.body: It sounds l9ike you may be experiencing issues with a missing or corrupt display driver. I strongly recommend grabbing the correct drivers for your laptop from your manufacturers support site. If you can't find a link to that page, let me know who makes your laptop and I'll give you the right link.
